snippet.title: Why I wrote 'there is no such thing as a junior Scrum Master'
snippet.description:
ğŸ“¢ Thereâ€™s No Such Thing as a Junior Scrum Master! ğŸš€ | Why Experience Matters in Scrum Mastery

Too many organizations and aspiring Scrum Masters misunderstand what the role actually requires. Some companies treat the Scrum Master role as an afterthoughtâ€”handing it off to whoever seems â€œleast busyâ€ on the team. 

Others think you can just become a Scrum Master without deep domain knowledge. Both approaches are deeply flawed.

In this video, I break down why thereâ€™s no such thing as a Junior Scrum Master, why experience matters, and how you truly become a great Scrum Master.
